item.title: A Customer Tried to Outplay the Dealership
item.description: A walk-through of an unusual situation where a customer attempted to secure a $120,000 advantage, and how the team handled it professionally. How would you react?

item.description: An overview of sales strategies some car brands use to influence buyers, with tips on how to stay informed and confident. Have you encountered these approaches?

item.description: A breakdown of common finance-office add-ons that buyers often don’t need, helping you avoid unnecessary costs. Which ones have you seen before?

item.description: A clear look at the market forces driving used car prices upward, from supply shortages to changing buyer demand. What does this mean for your next purchase?

item.description: An honest overview of the challenges and realities behind running a dealership, highlighting daily demands and financial pressures.

item.description: A look at which features were discontinued on the 2021 Tahoe and why those changes were made.

item.description: A helpful guide to avoid frequent buyer errors and make more informed decisions when purchasing a vehicle.

item.description: A clear breakdown of the major expenses involved in operating a car dealership, from staffing to inventory and overhead.

item.description: A practical explanation of one essential strategy buyers can use to stay informed and avoid unnecessary costs during a vehicle purchase.

item.description: An evaluation of a new salesperson’s early performance, highlighting progress, challenges, and areas for continued growth.

item.title: Cars Are Replaceable But My Daughter Is Not!
item.description: A personal reflection on why safe driving choices matter, emphasizing that vehicles can be replaced but loved ones cannot.

item.title: Buying a Ford with Engine Damage
item.description: Reviewing the risks and repair considerations when purchasing a Ford with significant engine failure.

item.description: A factual look at sales practices drivers may encounter at Texas dealerships and how to navigate them confidently.

item.description: Practical steps to help drivers present and negotiate their trade-in for a higher, fair market value.

item.description: An explanation of typical dealership revenue strategies so buyers understand where extra costs may appear.

item.description: A clear look at common dealership add-ons offered in the finance office and which ones buyers can confidently decline.

item.description: A transparent breakdown of how car finance managers earn their income — revealing the structure behind those big monthly numbers.

item.title: Satire fun! This car is available.
item.description: A lighthearted, satirical take on car listings and dealership culture, offering a fun look at how some ads really sound.

item.title: GM Employees Caught in Corvette Racing Scandal!
item.description: A shocking incident unfolds as GM employees are discovered using company Corvettes for unauthorized racing, sparking major controversy and serious consequences.

item.title: Understanding Your Car Loan Contract
item.description: Learn how to read car loan agreements the right way and avoid hidden terms or costly mistakes before signing.
